rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall that doubles as a living area, featuring ample natural light through French windows and a Vastu-aligned layout promoting energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A well-lit dining area adjoining the living room, with large windows for natural light and ventilation. Designed to adhere to Mediterranean aesthetics.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern kitchen designed for efficiency with a central island. Windows ensure natural light and proper ventilation, incorporating local building norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with a private balcony offering unobstructed natural light. The Vastu alignment is maintained for calm energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A well-ventilated bedroom with a private balcony, ensuring plenty of natural light and adherence to Mediterranean design principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom with a balcony for sunlight, designed to offer serene views and proper ventilation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom featuring a balcony that enhances natural light and fresh air, in line with Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: A versatile bedroom with a balcony designed for optimum light and ventilation, meeting both Mediterranean aesthetics and Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 6
rooms.description: A bright bedroom with a private balcony offering ample natural light and fresh air, ensuring energy balance as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom designed with a balcony for enhanced natural light and ventilation, incorporating local design norms.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A dedicated study area with large windows ensuring ample natural light and a quiet ambiance, in line with Mediterranean design.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: An open communal balcony adjoining the main living spaces, allowing fresh air and natural light to permeate the villa.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: A dedicated area for servants featuring a bedroom, small kitchenette and restroom, designed to be functional yet private.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A utility room including space for washing machines, drying area, and storage, integrated with local building standards.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A large arched door in keeping with Mediterranean style, ensuring a welcoming and secure entry point.

openings.name: French Windows
openings.description: Large windows integrated in the living area and bedrooms, designed to maximize natural light and promote cross ventilation.

openings.name: Balcony Doors

openings.name: Service Entrance
